aboutMe: Hi! my name is Hario Lai, I am a fresh graduate from President University with Information System major. Iâ€˜m an aspiring software engineer. I practices software development and understands its fundamentals. I enjoy taking problems and turning them into beautiful solution. I do website and mobile app development on free time. I love to learn new things, I love to read books, and I love to watch movies.

description: One of 30 selected participants out of 3000 applicants.
Get of opportunity to learnt and workshop about Data Analytic's Gojek Data Team and soft skill from GoAcademy for 3 weeks.

experiences.company: Philip Morris Sampoerna International Service Center
description: Developed the efficient way use Go language to reduce IIoT project configuration duration.
Worked on the project about migrate legacy system to new system that reduce the company maintenance cost also improve operation efficiency.
Became a coach assistant that trained a team up-to 10 developers in DevOps training project.
Keluarga Mahasiswa Buddhist Ashokavardhana is a student club at President University.
Develop and Mantained web-based application using HTML5, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap framework, PHP and MySQL.

education.name: President University
description: Completed an undergraduate degree in Computer Science concentrating in Information System; GPA 3.73 / 4.00.
Has been active in student organization and club.

project.name: I-Safe
project.description: I-Safe is about Personal Security App, implemented with React JS (HTML, CSS, JS) as the frontend for website, Kotlin as the frontend for Android mobile app, Go & Python as the backend, SQL & MongoDB as the database, and Nginx as the webserver which purposed for personal side project that has feature such as user(police and society) login and registration, create alarm report and broadcast notification to nearby users, check victim location, case management, chat group, police member management, and generate report/chart.

project.name: Just-Tip
project.description: Just-Tip is about "Jasa Titip" service, implemented with HTML and CSS as the frontend, PHP as the backend, and SQL as the database which purposed for university course project that has feature such as register and login as requirement for use the full service, check available service, manage order, manage product, and doing payment.

project.name: KMBA Website
project.description: KMBA Website is implemented with HTML and CSS as the frontend, PHP as the backend, and SQL as the database which purposed for Official Website of one of Club in University that has feature such as generated updated club members, online shop by "KMBA", generate list of articles, , generate list of events, and generate upcoming event.

project.name: Matrix
project.description: Matrix Printing Portal is about about online printing system service, implemented with HTML and CSS as the frontend, PHP as the backend, and SQL as the database which purpose for university course project that has feature such as user and admin registration, upload file, download file, printing activity management by admin and choosing printing spot by user.

competition.name: KickStart
competition.description: Kick Start is a global online coding competition, consisting of three-hour rounds of a variety of algorithmic challenges designed by Google engineers. Participants can compete in one or all online rounds held throughout the year, and will have the opportunity to develop and grow their programming abilities while getting a glimpse into the technical skills needed for a career at Google (top participants may be invited to interview at Google).
